Kubernetes is an open source platform

Manage Kubernetes on the other hand
is a service provided by cloud providers

For one,
it's very easy to spin up new Kubernetes clusters from scratch
and add additional computing power in response to load.
In addition,
it allows you to integrate with cutting-edge open source capabilities,

on IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service.
First we'll choose the name for the cluster,
as well as the region that we want to spin it up in.
We can drill in deeper and choose the exact datacenter
that we want our cluster to live in.
In addition, we can also choose a multi-zone cluster.

across multiple datacenters in the same region.
This gives us high availability

Next, we can choose the flavor for the computing power
for this Kubernetes cluster.
We can stick with virtual computing, or even bare metal.
